1.text: Rinse the asparagus under cool water.

2.text: Chop off the white ends with a chef’s knife.

3.text: Snap off the ends if you don’t want to use a knife.

4.text: Peel the woody lower half with a vegetable peeler.

5.text: Line up 3-4 spears on a cutting board.

6.text: Place a small knife on the asparagus and tilt it at an angle.

7.text: Cut the spears into 2 inches (5.1 cm) diagonal pieces.

9.text: Cut the spears in half with a chef’s knife.

10.text: Chop the halved spears into 1⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) pieces.
